alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Owyhee County through 600 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blue Creek Reservoir, or 24 miles north of Owyhee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flying H Ranch around 530 PM MDT. Patlock Ranch, Blue Creek Reservoir, Turner Butte and Riddle around 540 PM MDT. Payne Creek Reservoir around 550 PM MDT. Tindall Ranch and Grasmere around 600 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
